#summary allChanges()
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Returns a list of the object properties that have been changed but not yet saved to the database.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

-

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset member = model("member").findByKey(params.memberId)>
<cfset member.firstName = params.newFirstName>
<cfset member.email = params.newEmail>
<cfset changes = member.changedProperties()>
}}}

 * [hasChanged hasChanged()] (function)
 * [XXXHasChanged XXXHasChanged()] (function)
 * [changedFrom changedFrom()] (function)
